import{API}from"../../backend";export var createCategory=function createCategory(userId,token,category){return fetch("".concat(API,"/category/create/").concat(userId),{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify(category)}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};// create product
export var createProduct=function createProduct(userId,token,product){return fetch("".concat(API,"/product/create/").concat(userId),{method:"POST",headers:{Accept:"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:product}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};// get aproduct
export var getProduct=function getProduct(productId){return fetch("".concat(API,"/product/").concat(productId),{method:"GET"}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};// get All product
export var getAllProducts=function getAllProducts(){return fetch("".concat(API,"/product"),{method:"GET"}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});};// update a product 
export var updateProduct=function updateProduct(productId,userId,token,product){return fetch("".concat(API,"/product/").concat(productId,"/").concat(userId),{method:"PUT",headers:{Accept:"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:product}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};// delete product
export var deleteProduct=function deleteProduct(productId,userId,token){console.log("ending",productId," -- ",userId,"--- ",token);return fetch("".concat(API,"/product/").concat(productId,"/").concat(userId),{method:"DELETE",headers:{Accept:"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var getCategories=function getCategories(){return fetch("".concat(API,"/categories"),{method:"GET"}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var deleteCategory=function deleteCategory(categoryId,userId,token){return fetch("".concat(API,"/category/").concat(categoryId,"/").concat(userId),{method:"DELETE",headers:{Accept:"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var updateCategory=function updateCategory(categoryId,userId,token,category){return fetch("".concat(API,"/category/").concat(categoryId,"/").concat(userId),{method:"PUT",headers:{Accept:"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify(category)}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};export var getCategory=function getCategory(categoryId){return fetch("".concat(API,"/category/").concat(categoryId),{method:"GET"}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};
